description: ESD files are encrypted .WIM files. Electronic Software Download creates ESD files used to install, update, or upgrade Windows. For example, Microsoft Upgrade Assistant uses ESD files to upgrade users to new versions of Windows.
You may find ESD files in the following directory:

common_filenames.description: WinPayload.esd - The file Microsoft Upgrade Assistant uses to upgrade to Windows 8.
Install.esd - The file Microsoft Upgrade Assistant uses to upgrade to Windows 10.
